europython-edinburgh-2018.name: europython 2018
europython-edinburgh-2018.location: Edinburgh International Conference Centre, 150 Morrison Street, Edinburgh Scotland
europython-edinburgh-2018.description: EuroPython was the first major Python programming language community conference ever organized by volunteers. It started 2002 in Charleroi, Belgium, which attracted over 200 attendees. It now is the largest European Python conference with around 1200+ participants every year, the second largest Python conference world-wide and a meeting reference for all European programmers, students and companies interested in the Python programming language.

hyperledger-hackfests-amsterdam-2018.name: Hyperledger Hackfests 2018
hyperledger-hackfests-amsterdam-2018.keywords: hyperledger hackfests 2018, hyperledger, hackfests, amsterdam, hyperledger conference, conference 2018
hyperledger-hackfests-amsterdam-2018.location: ABN AMRO Head Office, Amsterdam, Netherlands
hyperledger-hackfests-amsterdam-2018.description: Hyperledger Hackfests are regular gatherings for developers working on the different projects hosted at Hyperledger.  The primary goal for a Hackfest is to facilitate software development collaboration and knowledge sharing between participants, with an eye towards reflecting all ideas and conclusions back outward to the public open source community afterwards.

js-interactive-vancouver-2018.name: JS Interactive 2018
js-interactive-vancouver-2018.keywords: js interactive 2018, javascript, vancouver, js conference, conference 2018
js-interactive-vancouver-2018.location: Vancouver Convention Centre, West Building, Vancouver, Canada
js-interactive-vancouver-2018.description: At JS Interactive, attendees collaborate face-to-face, network, and learn how to better their skills with JS in serverless, IoT, backend, and frontend. The program will cover a broad spectrum of the JavaScript ecosystem including Node.js, frameworks, best practices and stories from successful end-users.

jupytercon-new-york-2018.name: JupyterCon 2018
jupytercon-new-york-2018.keywords: jupytercon new york 2018, jupytercon, jupyter, new york, conference 2018
jupytercon-new-york-2018.location: New York Hilton Midtown, 1335 Avenue of the Americas, New York, USA
jupytercon-new-york-2018.description: JupyterCon focuses on real-world practices and how to successfully implement interactive computation in your workflow and projects. In just four days youâ€™ll discover the best practices for collaborative and reproducible data science; new use cases, and the expertise you need to transform your workflow with Jupyter.

linux-security-summit-vancouver-2018.name: Linux Security Summit 2018
linux-security-summit-vancouver-2018.keywords: linux security summit 2018, linux, vancouver, security summit, summit 2018
linux-security-summit-vancouver-2018.description: The Linux Security Summit (LSS) is a technical forum for collaboration between Linux developers, researchers, and end users with the primary aim of fostering community efforts in analyzing and solving Linux security challenges. LSS is where key Linux security community members and maintainers gather to present and discuss their work and research to peers, joined by those who wish to keep up with the latest in Linux security development and who would like to provide input to the development process.

open-source-summit-japan-tokyo-2018.name: Open Source Summit Japan 2018
open-source-summit-japan-tokyo-2018.keywords: open source summit 2018, open source, japan, os summit, summit 2018
open-source-summit-japan-tokyo-2018.location: Tokyo Conference Center Ariake, Tokyo, Japan
open-source-summit-japan-tokyo-2018.description: Open Source Summit Japan is the leading conference in Japan connecting the open source ecosystem under one roof, providing a forum for technologists and open source industry leaders to collaborate and share information, learn about the latest in open source technologies and find out how to gain a competitive advantage by using innovative open solutions.

pycon-cleveland-2018.name: PyCon 2018
pycon-cleveland-2018.keywords: pycon 2018, python, cleveland, python conference, conference 2018
pycon-cleveland-2018.location: Huntington Convention Center, 300 Lakeside Ave E, Cleveland, OH, USA
pycon-cleveland-2018.description: The PyCon 2018 conference, which will take place in Cleveland, is the largest annual gathering for the community using and developing the open-source Python programming language. It is produced and underwritten by the Python Software Foundation, the 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to advancing and promoting Python. Through PyCon, the PSF advances its mission of growing the international community of Python programmers.

pycon-india-hyderabad-2018.name: PyCon India 2018
pycon-india-hyderabad-2018.keywords: pycon india, pycon, python, hyderabad, python conference, conference 2018
pycon-india-hyderabad-2018.location: Hyderabad International Convention Centre, Kondapur, Hyderabad, Telangana

pydata-delhi-conference-delhi-2018.name: PyData Delhi Conference 2018
pydata-delhi-conference-delhi-2018.keywords: pydata conference delhi 2018, pydata conference, pydata, deep learning, python, conference 2018
pydata-delhi-conference-delhi-2018.location: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology Delhi, Delhi, India
pydata-delhi-conference-delhi-2018.description: PyData Delhi is a gathering of users and developers of data analysis tools in Python. A major goal of the meetup is to provide a venue for users across all the various domains of data analysis to share their experiences and their techniques, as well as highlight the most triumphs and potential pitfalls of using Python for certain kinds of problems.
